UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Stores user-specific data to personalize the AI experience.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

preferences.description: User preferences stored as a JSON string.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was last updated.

ChatSession.title: ChatSession
ChatSession.description: Stores a single chat session, including its title and messages.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this session.

title.description: The title of the chat session.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the session was created.

messages.description: An array of messages exchanged during the session.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a chat session.

role.description: The role of the message sender.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Each user has their own document.

/users/{userId}/sessions/{sessionId}.description: Stores the chat sessions for a specific user. Path-based ownership is inherited from the parent '/users/{userId}' document.
